description: This repository contains antibody/B cell and T cell epitope information and epitope prediction and analysis tools for use by the research community worldwide. Immune epitopes are defined as molecular structures recognized by specific antigen receptors of the immune system, namely antibodies, B cell receptors, and T cell receptors. Immune epitopes from infectious diseases, excluding HIV, and immune-mediated diseases and the accompanying biological information are included.
title: Immune Epitope Database and Analysis Resource (IEDB)
